wikipedia_page.main: Stavros "Stav" Danaos (born 8 April 1978) is an English  weather presenter of Greek Cypriot descent. He currently presents the BBC's national weather forecast and has previously worked for Reporting Scotland.

response: *Stav Danaos (weather presenter 2011–2013, now with BBC Weather)

link_mentions.page: List of current BBC newsreaders and reporters

response: Blanchett started working for BBC South Today in Southampton as a broadcast journalist before moving to the national BBC News Channel in London to work as a producer for the BBC Weather Centre. He then moved to Glasgow to present the BBC's Reporting Scotland weather forecasts alongside Judith Ralston, Stav Danaos and Cat Cubie.
*Stav Danaos, English broadcast journalist and BBC's national weather forecaster
